chunks.content: In 1997, Destiny's Child released their major label debut song 'Killing Time' on the soundtrack to the 1997 film, Men in Black. The following year, the group released their self-titled debut album, scoring their first major hit 'No, No, No'.

metadata.relevance_reason: This part directly mentions both the first major song hit and the context of its release.
metadata.answer_contribution: Identifies 'No, No, No' as the first major hit.
